original_title: Tango en París: recuerdos de Astor Piazzolla
overview: The story of two friends who met on the eve of their fiftieth birthday: musician Astor Piazzolla and architect José Pons. They never imagined that their friendship would change their lives forever.
tagline: Two friends, a struggle and the suffering of a unique being
title: Tango in Paris: Memories of Astor Piazzolla
